verses.roman:
eka-dina śrīvāsādi yata bhakta-gaṇa
mahāprabhura guṇa gāñā karena kīrtana

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; śrīvāsa-ādi—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura and others; yata—all; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; mahāprabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; guṇa—qualities; gāñā—describing; karena—perform; kīrtana—chanting.
translation: One day all the devotees, headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura, were chanting the transcendental qualities of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
